title: Methods of family planning
creator_credit: Jan Steen, John Churchill and Moreland-Latchford Productions
brief_description: Accurately and objectively explains the human reproductive cycle and all presently practised methods of practising it are seen as a matter of personal choice. Illustrates by animation. Avoids social and moral considerations.
creator_credit_for_label: Jan Steen, John Churchill and Moreland-Latchford Productions
